titleStmt.title: A key to catechisms: or An easie and familiar help for the true and right understanding of the principal substance of all catechisms whatsoever Suited to the meanest capacities, and the weakest memories.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Chiswell, and to be sold by Robert Eveleigh bookseller in Exon.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
